v.
HIGHWOODS REALTY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP; Highwoods DLF 98/29, LLC ; Highwoods DLF, LLC ; Highwoods Properties, Inc.; Grubb & Ellis/Thomas Linderman Graham; and Thomas Linderman Graham Inc. No. 263P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Thomas H. Stark, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, J. Anthony Penry, Attorney at Law, Seth Allen Neyhart, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for NNN Durham Office Portfolio 1, LLC, et al. Michael T. Medford, Attorney at Law, J. Whitfield Gibson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Grubb & Ellis/Thomas Linderman Graham, et al. Jonathan D. Sasser, Attorney at Law, Jeremy M. Falcone, Attorney at Law, James Michael Weiss, Attorney at Law, Emily Erixson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Highwoods Realty Limited Partnership, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiffs on the 2nd of August 2017 in this matter for discretionary review under G.S. 7A-31 prior to a determination by the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
